mapper.select: select s.id as id, s.title as title, h.name as holeName, sd.show_date as startDate ,sd.show_time as start_time, img_route as imgRoute from show_datetime_tb as sd join show_tb as s on s.id = sd.show_id join hole_tb as h on h.id= s.hole_id join rent_place_reservation_tb as r on r.hole_id=h.id where s.organizer_id=#{id} AND s.show_status=1 AND r.rent_place_status=1
